overview:
## Discussion

The current country code may be useful to construct the URL for a [doc://com.apple.MusicKit/documentation/MusicKit/MusicDataRequest] because a typical catalog endpoint for Apple Music API requires the inclusion of a country code in the path of the corresponding URL.

# currentCountryCode

**Type Property**

Fetches the current country code for the user’s Apple Music account.

## Declaration

```swift
static var currentCountryCode: String { get async throws }
```

## Discussion

The current country code may be useful to construct the URL for a [doc://com.apple.MusicKit/documentation/MusicKit/MusicDataRequest] because a typical catalog endpoint for Apple Music API requires the inclusion of a country code in the path of the corresponding URL.
title: currentCountryCode
